definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

sentences.english: Booking are needed to be made at least 3days in advance.
sentences.chinese: 租埸需于最少三个工作天前预约。

sentences.english: Ubuntu, in its quest for marketshare, has followed the same method.
sentences.chinese: 在探索她的市埸份额时，跟随了同样的方法。

sentences.english: Formation cause of geomagnetic field is one of the important difficult problems of geophysics.
sentences.chinese: 地磁埸的成因是地球物理学的重大理论难题之一。

sentences.english: Many soldiers fight hard in bloody battles to guard the border.
sentences.chinese: 为保卫祖国的边境，许多战士浴血疆埸。

sentences.english: Between the two countries is in line to the other party to the neutral, and has promised not to each other of aggression.
sentences.chinese: 两国向对方的立埸为中立，并且承诺不会互相侵略。

sentences.english: The injured footballer limped slowly off the field.
sentences.chinese: 受伤的足球队员跛着脚慢慢走出埸地。

sentences.english: The heavy rain spoiled our trip, however the farmer needed it badly.
sentences.chinese: 那埸大雨破坏了我们的旅行，可是那农夫非常需要它。

sentences.english: After the first half of the game, South Korea pushed for an equalizer against Togo.
sentences.chinese: 经过上半埸的赛事后，南韩尽力追和多哥。

sentences.english: We play many singles matches with students of Jiangmen tennis academy in morning and afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上，下午与江门网球学校作多埸单打练习赛。

sentences.english: From north to south it's a huge garbage dump, a ruins.
sentences.chinese: 从南到北就像一个垃圾埸，一个废墟。

sentences.english: The field is convenient to irrigate as it is by the river.
sentences.chinese: 这片疆埸临着小河，灌溉很方便。

definition: abbr. for 峴首山|岘首山[Xian4 shou3 shan1]/Mt Xianshou in Hubei/steep hill/used in place names
aromatic herb used for seasoning/variant of 香[xiang1]
variant of 喧[xuan1]/old variant of 諼|谖[xuan1]
to hurry/to rush/to run quickly/to elope
variant of 奔[ben1]/variant of 奔[ben4]
surname Ying/river in Henan and Anhui
grain husk/tip of sth short and slender
to attend (an official function)/to be present/to administer/to approach (esp. as administrator)
variant of 蒞|莅[li4], to attend
to fasten with rivets/(coll.) to exert one's strength
